channel.title: Java isnt recongized as an internal or exernal command
channel.description: When i click run server, it says " 'java' is not recognized as and internal or external command, operable program or batch file. I have the latest java update, i need some one who knows what there doing to help =) Thanks

item.title: Java isnt recongized as an internal or exernal command
item.dc:creator: @maggot525 maggot525
item.description:
@maggot525 wrote:

set your class path.

Read full topic

item.title: Java isnt recongized as an internal or exernal command
item.dc:creator: @boomer4456 boomer4456
item.description:
@boomer4456 wrote:

[quote=“Doogie, post:1, topic:222818”]When i click run server, it says " ‘java’ is not recognized as and internal or external command, operable program or batch file. I have the latest java update, i need some one who knows what there doing to help =) Thanks[/quote] ok do this try going to ur system varibles and if you see something called path type this fir its varible %SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\System32\Wbem;C:\hp\bin\Python worked for me

Read full topic
